about_the_game:
"Pretty Girls Pop Match" is a puzzle game that allows you to raise legendary adventurers with unique abilities to overcome various challenges created just for you!

■Embark on an adventure!

The Demon Lord has taken your fellow adventurers captive! Rescue them and recruit them to your team! Utilize their unique abilities to conquer the challenges ahead!

■A puzzle game with an easy approach!

The goal of the game is straightforward: align the colorful jewels in sets of three to earn the points needed to win!

■Blow those jewels away!

Collect enough points to unlock "magical items" that can clear all jewels from the map. Discover their explosive power by earning high scores!

■Enhance your magical item effects using adventurer skills!

Adventurer skills can imrpove the effects of the magical items even further! Enhance your adventurers' skills with gems earned in each stage to improve their abilities and use their powerful skills to overcome challenges!

■Get the highest score and aim for the top!

All games are linked to a global ranking system, allowing you to compete with other players for the top position! Aim for the highest spot!

■Create your favourite levels with Diorama!

Create custom levels in the Diorama system with your chosen adventurer, sprite, background, stamps, and decorations! You can also save your creations for later use!

■Adventurers


  • Thina Ariosto
    Class：Gunner
    Skill：Magical Shooting
    Skill Effect：enhances the "Rocket" magical item.
    Thina is a skilled shooter, with the ability to manipulate the magical bullets she shoots as she pleases.
  • Sonia Judith
    Class：Knight
    Skill：Magical Slash
    Skill Effect：enhances the "Sword" magical item.
    Sonia is an experienced knight who excels in both swordsmanship and spellcasting.
  • Sara Magnus
    Class：Sorcerer
    Skill：Magical Bomber
    Skill Effect：enhances the "Bomb" magical item.
    Sara is a renowned mage, capable of casting powerful spells.
  • Arishia Airmard
    Class：Nun
    Arishia is a nun who will provide support to the player throughout their adventure!

※All characters in this game are officially licensed.
※All characters in this game are over 18 years old.
